comments:
Build ID:  I20070621-1340

Steps To Reproduce:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2007-07-13 23:09:07.462
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Synchronizying queries for JIRA localhost".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.jira.ui.JiraTaskDataHandler.updateTaskData(JiraTaskDataHandler.java:245)
	at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.jira.ui.JiraTaskDataHandler.createTaskData(JiraTaskDataHandler.java:101)
	at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.jira.ui.JiraRepositoryConnector.performQuery(JiraRepositoryConnector.java:168)
	at org.eclipse.mylyn.tasks.ui.SynchronizeQueryJob.synchronizeQuery(SynchronizeQueryJob.java:175)
	at org.eclipse.mylyn.tasks.ui.SynchronizeQueryJob.run(SynchronizeQueryJob.java:116)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)


More information:
Maybe the JiraTaskDataHandler does not like linked tasks or tasks with sub-tasks.
Subtasks are supported. Most probably your issue is already fixed. Please try the next dev build.
Great, the current development version v2.0.0.v20070713-1300 is working correctly - thanks.
